sentences.sContent: So there are two other models, then, models different from the immigration model, two other models for understanding the formation of Israel, that build on this archaeological evidence.
sentences.sCn: 那么还有两个其他的模型，与移民模型不同的两个模型，这两个模型也是为了说明以色列的形成，它们是依据考古学证据。

trans.tranCn: 考古学的；与考古学有关的 (<美>archeological)
